participant_1.background:

When I need a break from the world, I put on my earphones and listen to folk metal.
i live alone with my dog.
I don't want to disclose my wealth.
i am a college drop out.

I own a computer that is suitable for my needs.
I'm a radio DJ with a sweet tooth.
My biggest challenge was accepting that my whining was getting in the way of my relationships.
my mother was a weightlifter.
i d like to be a teacher in the future.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I am a DJ for a radio station.
That sounds fun, what kinds of music do you play?
I play all kinds of music, but my favorite is folk metal.
I have never heard of folk metal, what is it?
It is a type of metal music that has traditional folk music elements.
That sounds interesting, I will have to look it up.
You should! I think you would like it.
So, what are your plans for the future?
I would like to be a teacher.
That is a great goal! What kind of teacher do you want to be?
I am not sure yet, but I am interested in teaching music.
That would be cool, you could play your favorite music for your students.
That is exactly what I would like to do!
